0.user_question: Given a list of conditions, please answer the question. Condition 1:

1.subquestion: Which condition(s) should be added or modified if I want to create an instruction based only on one single topic without unnecessary information?

subanswer.text:
To ensure instructions focus solely on one specific subject matter while eliminating irrelevant details, you can modify your approach as follows:

1. Identify Core Topic: Pinpoint exactly what aspect of the general task needs emphasis—whether it’s about baking cookies involving precise measurements (e.g., teaspoons), focusing purely on cooking methods like boiling water separately before adding pasta, removing unrelated items such as seasonings not pertinent to making mashed potatoes. This ensures clarity around which elements belong within this singular context.

2. Remove Superfluous Information: Eliminate any extra guidance surrounding tasks outside our chosen theme; instances might include advice regarding mixing cake batter ingredients versus merely stating whether flour was mixed into wet components during preparation – both relevant but excessive when isolating attention strictly onto creating cookie mixtures using specified measuring utensils including spoons specifically named 'teaspoon.' Similarly remove data pertaining recipes incorporating additional fruits aside eggs & sugar blended together until smooth texture formed since these inputs deviate further away towards non-essential topics concerning breadmaking processes mentioned herein earlier discussions revolving entirely round ideas exclus
